MarrsProject.title: Public Sparql Endpoints

Query.title: Search for a protein by preferred name
Search for a protein by Uniprot ID
Search for a human gene by HGNC Symbol

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> PREFIX skos:<http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> SELECT distinct ?src ?label ?hgnc ("gene" AS ?type) ("Homo sapiens" AS ?species) ("Uniprot" AS ?provenance) WHERE { SERVICE <http://beta.sparql.uniprot.org/sparql> { ?protein rdfs:seeAlso ?hgnc . ?protein rdfs:seeAlso ?src . ?src up:database <http://purl.uniprot.org/database/GeneID> . ?hgnc rdfs:comment ?label . FILTER (?label IN ("${GENENAME}")) . ?hgnc up:database <http://purl.uniprot.org/database/HGNC> . } }

Query.title: Search for a gene by entrez gene id
Search Uniprot for a disease by keyword
Search for a GO identifier
Search for a GO term
Search for a pathway by name

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX biopax3: <http://www.biopax.org/release/biopax-level3.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?src ?label ("pathway" as ?type) ?species ("reactome" as ?provenance) WHERE { SERVICE <https://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/reactome/sparql> { ?src rdf:type biopax3:Pathway . ?src biopax3:displayName ?label . FILTER (regex(?label, ("${PWYNAME|literal}"), "i")) . ?src biopax3:organism ?taxonId . ?taxonId biopax3:name ?species . FILTER (?species IN ("Homo sapiens", "Mus musculus")) . } }

Query.title: find genes for a protein
find proteins for a gene
Find reactome pathways containing this protein
Find proteins contained in this reactome pathway
Find metabolites contained in this reactome pathway
Find super-pathways

MarrsProject.Query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX biopax3: <http://www.biopax.org/release/biopax-level3.owl#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?src ?src_label ?dest ?dest_label ?dest_species ("pathway" AS ?dest_type) ("reactome" as ?provenance) ("subpathway" as ?interaction) WHERE { SERVICE <https://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/reactome/sparql> { ?src rdf:type biopax3:Pathway . ?dest rdf:type biopax3:Pathway . ?dest biopax3:pathwayComponent ?src . ?src biopax3:displayName ?src_label . ?dest biopax3:displayName ?dest_label . FILTER (?src IN (${ID|uri-list})) . ?dest biopax3:organism ?taxonId . ?taxonId biopax3:name ?dest_species . } }

Query.title: Find sub-pathways

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX biopax3: <http://www.biopax.org/release/biopax-level3.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?src ?src_label ?dest ?dest_label ?dest_species ("pathway" AS ?dest_type) ("reactome" as ?provenance) ("subpathway" as ?interaction) WHERE { SERVICE <https://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/reactome/sparql> { ?src rdf:type biopax3:Pathway . ?dest rdf:type biopax3:Pathway . ?src biopax3:pathwayComponent ?dest . ?src biopax3:displayName ?src_label . ?dest biopax3:displayName ?dest_label . FILTER (?src IN (${ID|uri-list})) . ?dest biopax3:organism ?taxonId . ?taxonId biopax3:name ?dest_species . } }

Query.title: Find biochemical reactions of this protein

MarrsProject.Query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX biopax3: <http://www.biopax.org/release/biopax-level3.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?src ?dest ?dest_label (?rel AS ?interaction) ("biochemical reaction" AS ?dest_type) ("uniprot" AS ?provenance) WHERE { SERVICE <https://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/services/reactome/sparql> { ?dest a biopax3:BiochemicalReaction . { {?dest ?rel ?protein .} UNION { ?dest ?rel ?complex . ?complex a biopax3:Complex . ?complex ?comp ?protein . }} ?protein a biopax3:Protein . ?protein biopax3:entityReference ?src . FILTER (?src IN (${ID|uri-list})) . ?dest biopax3:displayName ?dest_label . } }

Query.title: Find proteins within a biochemical reaction
Find chembl compounds linked to this protein
Find proteins that are linked this compound in chembl
find GO terms for protein
